<p>Now that we know <a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/amazon-prime-day/">Amazon Prime Day</a> will be coming up soon on July 8-11, it’s time to start thinking about what you may want to snag at a discount during the sale. If you pay the $139 annual fee for Prime, sale events like these are a great time to stock up on essentials and cross things off your wishlist while you can save some money. Most discounts will be exclusively available to Prime subscribers, but there are always a few that anyone shopping on Amazon can grab. Similarly, there are always early deals in the days and weeks leading up to Prime Day, and this year is no different. Here, we’ve collected the best Prime Day deals you can shop for right now and we’ll keep updating this post as we get close to Prime Day proper.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-prime-day-deals-early-deals-to-shop-now">Prime Day deals: Early deals to shop now</h2> 
<h3 id="jump-link-prime-day-deals-under-50">Prime Day deals under $50</h3> 
<p>
 <core-commerce id="140cbdf2501e433195df7d8aceca4830" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/Soundcore-Bluetooth-Waterproof-Dustproof-Electronics/dp/B0DB1753RZ"></core-commerce></p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Audible+Premium+Plus+%28three+months%29+for+%243+%28%2442+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAASHSyb8G1SNdfqggYIUMMJgby0B5BcGgOaauFNcHvfgu&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAudible-Books-and-Originals%2Fb%3Fnode%3D18145289011" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Audible-Books-and-Originals/b?node=18145289011&amp;"><strong>Audible Premium Plus (three months) for $3 ($42 off):</strong></a> New subscribers can get three months of Audible for only $3, which represents a $42 discount. The Premium Plus tier gives you one book credit per month to use on any audiobook the service has, and you can stream any of the included titles for free on top of that. Audible also has members-only sales and discounts that you'll be able to take advantage of, too. The deal runs through July 31.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B07DBXZZN3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker+313+wireless+charging+stand+for+%2414+%2829+percent+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0Fua2VyLVFpLUNlcnRpZmllZC1Db21wYXRpYmxlLUZhc3QtQ2hhcmdpbmctUG93ZXJXYXZlL2RwL0IwN0RCWFpaTjM_&amp;signature=AQAAAX1ChX6EWKGVRqES-LBEst8ZU6DIzjtR3eLK2_8FchC4&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Qi-Certified-Compatible-Fast-Charging-PowerWave%2Fdp%2FB07DBXZZN3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Qi-Certified-Compatible-Fast-Charging-PowerWave/dp/B07DBXZZN3?th=1"><strong>Anker 313 wireless charging stand for $14 (29 percent off):</strong></a> One of our top picks for the <a data-i13n="cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-wireless-charger-140036359.html">best wireless chargers</a>, Anker's 313 stand keeps things simple but effective. Just plop your phone down on its wide stand to get up to 10W of fast-charging power. It supports both portrait and landscape orientation for your phone, and it'll work with cases up to 5mm thick.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CCC69HN3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Samsung+SmartTag+2+for+%2418.50+%2838+percent+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwQ0NDNjlITjM_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiYmVjOWRhOWUtYTY4NS00Yjc4LWI1MzItZjkwNjFhYTdhM2EzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwQ0NDNjlITjMiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&amp;signature=AQAAAfV90UWRHU8PH2GtyQqsK3blGgbfj4qWHPz-J3pFKOmT&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0CCC69HN3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CCC69HN3?th=1"><strong>Samsung SmartTag 2 for $18.50 (38 percent off):</strong></a> Samsung users looking to keep track of their stuff need look no further than the SmartTag 2. One of our top picks for the <a data-i13n="cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-bluetooth-tracker-140028377.html">best Bluetooth trackers</a>, this accessory easily attaches to keys, bags and other items and uses Samsung's large finding network to show you their last known location.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B09NRG4GK3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker+633+10K+magnetic+battery+pack+for+%2443+%2828+percent+off%2C+Prime+exclusive%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0Fua2VyLU1hZ25ldGljLUZvbGRhYmxlLVdpcmVsZXNzLVBvcnRhYmxlL2RwL0IwOU5SRzRHSzM_&amp;signature=AQAAARB7tuuZfA4xfK19ZZBx6pxb4uOssVHoumBqJCGvgaFR&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Magnetic-Foldable-Wireless-Portable%2Fdp%2FB09NRG4GK3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Magnetic-Foldable-Wireless-Portable/dp/B09NRG4GK3?th=1"><strong>Anker 633 10K magnetic battery pack for $43 (28 percent off, Prime exclusive):</strong></a> This 10K battery pack attaches magnetically to the backs of iPhones, making it easy to recharge while on the go. It also has a built-in kickstand for easy video watching or FaceTime calling while powering up.</p>

They also have a solid eight-hour battery life, plus an extra 40 with their charging case.</p> 
<h3 id="jump-link-prime-day-apple-deals">Prime Day Apple deals</h3> 
<p>
 <core-commerce id="445c7ce2c2f24a5c867dd7c8bb17fe3e" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D1XD1ZV3/"></core-commerce></p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:10;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DGHMNQ5Z&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+AirPods+4+for+%2499+at+Amazon+%28%2430+off%29&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0FwcGxlLUJsdWV0b290aC1IZWFkcGhvbmVzLVBlcnNvbmFsaXplZC1FZmZvcnRsZXNzL2RwL0IwREdITU5RNVo_&amp;signature=AQAAAepGsBKUeN4vu66dm_M4p2LqI1JqYxI9ekqHq-D4eZ7Z&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-Bluetooth-Headphones-Personalized-Effortless%2Fdp%2FB0DGHMNQ5Z" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Apple-Bluetooth-Headphones-Personalized-Effortless/dp/B0DGHMNQ5Z?th=1"><strong>Apple AirPods 4 for $99 at Amazon ($30 off)</strong></a>: Apple’s wireless earbuds don't have the best sound quality or battery life, and this entry-level model lacks wireless charging, Find My tracking and onboard volume controls. But it still gets you tons of Apple-friendly features — from fast pairing with iCloud devices to spatial audio to hands-free Siri — and its lightweight design should fit most ears better than previous AirPods.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:11;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DZ77D5HL&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+iPad+%28A16%29+for+%24299+at+Amazon+%28%2450+off%29&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAfBAQGS8XoVWvcD-YOnlEPdmspjybafSiHS7h3pdzTQd&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-iPad-11-inch-Display-All-Day%2Fdp%2FB0DZ77D5HL" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Apple-iPad-11-inch-Display-All-Day/dp/B0DZ77D5HL?th=1"><strong>Apple iPad (A16) for $299 at Amazon ($50 off)</strong></a>: The latest base model iPad comes with a faster A16 chip, 2GB more RAM and 128GB of storage as standard. It earned a <a data-i13n="cpos:12;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/ipad-2025-with-a16-review-no-apple-intelligence-no-problem-132641539.html">score of 84</a> in our review — if you only need an iPad for roaming the internet, watching shows and doing some lighter productivity tasks, it's a good starter tablet.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:13;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DZDC3WW5&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+MacBook+Air+%2813-inch%2C+M4%29+for+%24829+%28%24170+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAUWv4Q2N6305DQnZ6veP8KDhN73izhzY9UiJBdueXlKW&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DZDC3WW5%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DZDC3WW5/?th=1"><strong>Apple MacBook Air (13-inch, M4) for $829 ($170 off):</strong></a> The latest MacBook Air is the top pick in our guide to the <a data-i13n="cpos:14;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/best-laptops-120008636.html">best laptops</a>, and it earned a score of 92 <a data-i13n="cpos:15;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/apple-macbook-air-m4-13-inch-and-15-inch-review-minimal-upgrades-at-a-much-better-price-130002570.html">in our review</a>. It's another spec bump, but that's not a bad thing — the design remains exceptionally thin, light and well-built, with long battery life and a top-notch keyboard and trackpad. Now it's a bit faster. (Though we'd still love more ports and a refresh rate higher than 60Hz.)</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:16;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DLBTPDCS&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+Mac+Mini+M4+for+%24469+%28%24130+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRExCVFBEQ1M_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiYmVjOWRhOWUtYTY4NS00Yjc4LWI1MzItZjkwNjFhYTdhM2EzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRExCVFBEQ1MiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&amp;signature=AQAAARskR2_K3aK4tsgntdkByQjBXeRlfqG2_sEc00OLzwKq&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DLBTPDCS" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DLBTPDCS?th=1"><strong>Apple Mac Mini M4 for $469 ($130 off):</strong></a> If you prefer desktops, the upgraded <a data-i13n="cpos:17;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/apple-mac-mini-review-m4-pro-2024-shockingly-small-incredibly-powerful-140042432.html">M4 Mac mini</a> is one that won’t take up too much space, but will provide a ton of power at the same time. Not only does it come with an M4 chipset, but it also includes 16GB of RAM in the base model, plus front-facing USB-C and headphone ports for easier access.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:18;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DGHYQ1VJ&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+Watch+Series+10+for+%24329+%28%2470+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdIWVExVko_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiYmVjOWRhOWUtYTY4NS00Yjc4LWI1MzItZjkwNjFhYTdhM2EzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdIWVExVkoiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&amp;signature=AQAAAcQcjNOwWxDbiAKMoptoY9v3Qfel5xjkz1TK5IqaWKaC&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DGHYQ1VJ" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DGHYQ1VJ?th=1"><strong>Apple Watch Series 10 for $329 ($70 off):</strong></a> We consider Apple’s flagship wearable to be the<a data-i13n="cpos:19;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/wearables/best-smartwatches-153013118.html"> best smartwatch</a> you can buy, period. It's a <a data-i13n="cpos:20;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/wearables/apple-watch-series-10-review-legacy-and-sequel-in-equal-measure-120021405.html">mostly iterative update</a>, with faster charging, a slightly slimmer design and a marginally larger display than the prior Series 9. That said, it's still a comprehensive fitness tracker, and no other smartwatch can integrate as neatly with iPhones and other Apple devices.</p> 
<h3 id="jump-link-prime-day-tech-deals">Prime Day tech deals</h3> 
<p>

You'll be able to see both live feeds in the Ring app, and they can send you motion alerts and let you speak to people on the other end of the camera when you're not at home.</p>

The company managed to improve sound quality and ANC this time around, plus they have an even comfier design and loads of extra features like multi-device connectivity, Speak-to-Chat and more.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-what-is-prime-day">What is Prime Day?</h2> 
<p>Prime Day is Amazon's members-only shopping event, which means you’ll have to be a Prime subscriber on Prime Day to take advantage of most of the savings. Amazon still offers a<a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:39;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=30-day+free+trial&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAY9G7Vv8U1uAzPifCKUV7x-37R6HsBwjlg2JDvSLtryY&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Famazonprime" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/amazonprime?"> 30-day free trial</a> to new Prime subscribers, so you can start your free trial closer to July and participate in the event.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-when-is-prime-day-2025">When is Prime Day 2025?</h2> 
<p><a data-i13n="cpos:40;pos:1" href="https://www.aboutamazon.com/news/retail/amazon-prime-day-july-2025">Amazon Prime Day 2025</a> will be back this year on July 8 through July 11.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-how-often-is-prime-day">How often is Prime Day?</h2> 
<p>Amazon Prime Day typically comes around annually in July. In the last few years, Amazon has also had its "Big Deal Days" in October, which is effectively a second Prime Day and the unofficial kickoff to the holiday shopping season.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-how-does-prime-day-work">How does Prime Day work?</h2> 
<p>Prime subscribers can go to Amazon's site on Prime Day to see all of the exclusive deals they have access to. Prime subscribers do not have to do anything additional to get Prime Day sales: the discounts you see on product pages will show up in your cart automatically. If you're not a Prime subscriber and you go to Amazon to shop on Prime Day, you'll likely see tons of items on sale but only "with Prime;" those discounts will not be available to those who are not active Prime subscribers.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-is-prime-day-only-for-prime-members">Is Prime Day only for Prime members?</h2> 
<p>Technically yes, but even if you do not pay for a Prime membership, you should still check out Amazon on Prime Day. While most Prime Day deals will be exclusively available to subscribers, there are always a handful of sales available to all shoppers. Amazon distinguishes between them very clearly: you'll see "Prime exclusive" on product pages near the deal pricing on the discounts that are only available to paying members.</p> 
<p>Separately, it’s very likely that other retailers like Walmart, Target and Best Buy will have their own competing Prime Day sales during that time frame, too. So if you're not keen on shopping at Amazon at all, it's worth checking out other retailers during the week of Prime Day to see if they are matching Prime Day deal prices.</p>This article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com/deals/amazon-prime-day-2025-the-best-early-deals-available-now-dates-and-everything-else-you-need-to-know-120028680.html?src=rss
